Articles.Content: Do you know any good free android games? I like "silly" games and games you have to put an effort into. I think I'd love a 4X game, if you know any!

There are lots of free android games which you like it.It includes all kinds of games and also top free games for android phones.If you want to download these games then you should visit IT World Plus and have fun.

I like two space games, galaxy on fire 2 hd port for android (its free) and Out there! This one is very similar to ftl.

Edited July 17, 2014 by TheScareCake!
did a typo
SimpleRockets is a nice 2D space sim, like KSP.

I don't play many games on my phone, but you did spark a moment of 'did anyone port this?'

https://github.com/zielmicha/freeciv-android/
